title: Mister Senstive ( Donnell Rawlings interview)
itunes:title: Mister Senstive ( Donnell Rawlings interview)
description:
Today on the show Donnell Rawlings returned to the show, and was able to resolve some issues between him Envy and Charlamagne. Plus Charlamagne even gave him a gift, but not the usual gift someone would give to apologize. In addition, Charlamagne also gave "Donkey of the Day" to two Floridians who were arrested for road rage shooting after a banana was thrown at one of their trucks and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
